Package controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the login menu.

  • Method Details

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Connects to database to check if entered username and password are valid and switches scene if successful. Writes to a .txt file if login is successfully or not Alert pops up if user gave incorrect information.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - user clicking on Login button
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • loginValidation

      private boolean loginValidation(String username, String password)
      Validates user login
      Parameters:
      username - user's username
      password - user's password
      Returns:
      true if login info valid, false if not

    • switchToMainMenuScene

      private void switchToMainMenuScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Switches scene to main menu
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - user clicking on login with correct login information
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • setAllToFrench

      private void setAllToFrench()
      Sets current text and labels to French.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Sets entire login form to French if user locale is set to French.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if
